# init(_:) | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ simd ](/documentation/simd)

- [ simd_quatf ](/documentation/simd/simd_quatf)

Initializer# init(_:)

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+macOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+watchOS 9.0+

```
init(_ rotation: Rotation3D)
```

## [See Also](/documentation/simd/simd_quatf/init(_:)-9rvr0#see-also)

### [Initializing a quaternion](/documentation/simd/simd_quatf/init(_:)-9rvr0#Initializing-a-quaternion)

[`init()`](/documentation/simd/simd_quatf/init())Creates a new quaternion.[`init(vector: simd_float4)`](/documentation/simd/simd_quatf/init(vector:))Creates a new quaternion from a four-element vector.[`init(simd_float3x3)`](/documentation/simd/simd_quatf/init(_:)-1hlsg)Creates a new quaternion from a 3 x 3 rotation matrix.[`init(simd_float4x4)`](/documentation/simd/simd_quatf/init(_:)-3751)Creates a new quaternion from a 4 x 4 rotation matrix.[`init(angle: Float, axis: SIMD3<Float>)`](/documentation/simd/simd_quatf/init(angle:axis:))Creates a new quaternion with an action that’s a rotation about an axis.[`init(from: SIMD3<Float>, to: SIMD3<Float>)`](/documentation/simd/simd_quatf/init(from:to:))Creates a new quaternion with an action that’s a rotation between two vectors.[`init(ix: Float, iy: Float, iz: Float, r: Float)`](/documentation/simd/simd_quatf/init(ix:iy:iz:r:))Creates a new quaternion from four scalar values that specify the imaginary and real parts.[`init(real: Float, imag: SIMD3<Float>)`](/documentation/simd/simd_quatf/init(real:imag:))Creates a new quaternion from a scalar real part and a vector imaginary part.
